casebody.data:
98-3082 (La. 4/1/99)

STATE ex rel. Thomas TOLER v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 98-KH-3082. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Toler, Thomas; — Plaintiffs); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Orleans Criminal District Court Div. “G” Number 361-899; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98KW-1353

Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.8; State ex rel. Glover v. State, 93-2330 (La.9/5/95), 660 So.2d 1189; La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.3; State ex rel. Melinie v. State, 93-1380 (La.1/12/96), 665 So.2d 1172.

CALOGERO, C.J. not on panel.
